channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Quick Code
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Quick Code

item.title: CVE-2024-7822|2024-09-12T13:49:21.288Z -- unknown -- quick%20code
item.description: The Quick Code WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-7822|2024-09-12T06:00:05.782Z -- unknown -- quick%20code
item.description: The Quick Code WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.
